page.title: 04SURVEY OF LISTED BUILDINGS.
page.content: The schedule of listed buildings in Trafford published in l98l contains information on the following number of properties in the area surveyed: {FORMER DISTRICT. GRADE II. Gd. III. Bowdon Urban Dist. 4. 3. Hale Urban Dist. l5. 6. The following are typical and notable. {BOWDON.} {<G = Grade.> GII OS 7686 Bowdon Old Hall. Cl7/l8. II 7686 Moss cottage, Farmhouse & Barn South Downs Rd.l500/l660,thatched, timber cruck, wattle & daub. III 7685 The Priory,ex_vicarage. C.l8. III 7686 Oak Field Cott.Gothic Villas. {HALE. <OS = Map Ref.> III 7985 Hale Sunday Sch. & Masters House. Hale Rd. C.l8.Still in use. GII 7686 Hale Railway Station. l864. GII 7686 Station Master's House. Formerly Peel Causeway farmhouse. {GII=Buildings warranting preservation.
